dialogue.htmlContent:
Once more you find yourself standing outside Zaranix's home. Much like all the other buildings in this area of the city, the incubus's residence takes the form of a grand, regency-style town-house. Unlike the majority of the surrounding buildings, however, there's a modestly sized private garden adjoined to the right-hand side of the property. A tall, cast-iron fence separates this garden from the street in which you're standing.

Since your first visit, the security seems to have been increased, and you can see the faint shimmer of an arcane barrier above the garden's fence, making any entry from that direction impossible. Similarly, the front door has been replaced by a far sturdier-looking one, and you imagine that even the strongest of demons would have difficulty in breaking it down.

#IF(!game.isExtendedWorkTime())

Due to the unsociable hour, you're certain that Amber will not come to answer the door if you were to knock it. It might be best to return at a more reasonable time, such as between [style.colourMinorBad([units.time(6)] and [units.time(22)])]...

#ENDIF

#IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime())

As you left Zaranix on relatively amicable terms, you don't think that there would be any trouble in simply knocking the front door...

#ENDIF

As Zaranix didn't seem to be too hostile towards you when you last visited, you decide that there'd be no harm in knocking on his door once more. Hoping for the best, you step forwards and take hold of the ornate brass door knocker, before delivering a sharp rap to alert those inside of your presence.

After just a few moments, you hear the sound of a lock being slid back, before the heavy oaken door swings inwards to reveal the fiery-haired form of Zaranix's maid, Amber. A fearsome snarl instantly breaks out across her face as she recognises you, and you see her knuckles turning white as she grips the edge of the door in anger. Her glowing amber eyes lock onto yours, and she growls, [amber.speech(You fucking bitch! How dare you show your face here again?! What the fuck do you want this time?!)]

Despite her angry words, it doesn't look like she's going to slam the door on your face. Her willingness to listen to what it is you have to say takes you a little by surprise, and, not wanting to waste the opportunity, you explain, [pc.speech(I wanted to pay Zaranix another visit. There were some things I wanted to ask him.)]

As her tail swishes from side to side with impatience, Amber narrows her piercing, luminescent-amber eyes and glares at you in an intimidating manner as she responds, [amber.speech(You're lucky that you're under the protection of Lilaya, bitch. If you weren't, I'd have had the Enforcers enslave you, and you'd be nothing more than my worthless cumdump right now.)] Amber releases her grip on the door and crosses her arms, still snarling at you as she continues, [amber.speech(But we can't all have our own way, can we? As it so happens, Zaranix has instructed me to allow you in. That name of Lilaya's sure does carry some weight in certain circles.)]

[pc.speech(So, can you let me in then?)] you ask, hoping that Amber will step back and allow you pass.

[amber.speech(Not so fast, bitch,)] Amber says, her voice dripping with malice. [amber.speech(I can't disobey my master's wishes, but if you want to get on my good side - which you should - then before stepping foot in this house, you'll drop to your knees and beg for me to forgive you for all you've done.)]

Knowing that Zaranix has instructed Amber to let you inside, you could refuse and simply push your way past the angry maid. Then again, maybe it would be a good idea to just do as Amber says and apologise...

As Zaranix didn't seem to be too hostile towards you when you last visited, you decide that there'd be no harm in knocking on his door once more. Hoping for the best, you step forwards and take hold of the ornate brass door knocker, before delivering a sharp rap to alert those inside of your presence.

After just a few moments, you hear the sound of a lock being slid back, before the heavy oak door swings inwards to reveal one of the most striking succubi you've ever seen. Her gorgeous face and perfectly proportioned body are covered in pitch-black ebony skin, but it's not her voluptuous figure which your eyes are drawn to. Styled into loose waves, and giving off a luminescent, yellowy-orange glow, it's her extraordinary amber hair, which reaches down to just above her ass, that you find yourself gazing at. As her eyes fixate themselves onto yours, you see that her irises are the exact same glowing-amber shade as her hair, giving this demon a truly remarkable appearance. Seeing who it is at her master's front door, she snarls, [amber.speech(You're the bitch that took my master's slave, aren't you? How dare you show your face here again?! What the fuck do you want this time?!)]

Despite her angry words, it doesn't look like she's going to slam the door on your face. Her willingness to listen to what it is you have to say takes you a little by surprise, and, not wanting to waste the opportunity, you explain, [pc.speech(I wanted to pay Zaranix another visit. There were some things I wanted to ask him.)]

As her tail swishes from side to side with impatience, the maid narrows her piercing, luminescent-amber eyes and glares at you in an intimidating manner as she responds, [amber.speech(You're lucky that you're under the protection of Lilaya, bitch. If you weren't, I'd have had the Enforcers enslave you, and you'd be nothing more than my worthless cumdump right now.)] Stepping forwards and crossing her arms, the succubus snarls at you as she continues, [amber.speech(But we can't all have our own way, can we? As it so happens, Zaranix has instructed me to allow you in. That name of Lilaya's sure does carry some weight in certain circles.)]

[pc.speech(So, can you let me in then?)] you ask, hoping that she'll step back and allow you pass.

[amber.speech(Not so fast, bitch,)] she says, her voice dripping with malice, [amber.speech(I can't disobey my master's wishes, but if you want to get on my good side - which you should - then before stepping foot in this house, you'll drop to your knees and beg for me to forgive you for all that you've done. Oh, and you'll address me as 'Mistress Amber' if you know what's good for you.)]

Knowing that Zaranix has instructed 'Mistress' Amber to let you inside, you could refuse and simply push your way past. Then again, maybe it would be a good idea to just do as Amber says and apologise...

Deciding to pay Zaranix's household another visit, you step forwards and take hold of the ornate brass door knocker, before delivering a sharp rap to alert those inside of your presence.

After just a few moments, you hear the familiar sound of a lock being slid back, before the heavy oaken door swings inwards to reveal the fiery-haired form of Zaranix's maid, Amber. A look of disgust instantly breaks out across her face as she recognises you, and you see her tail swish to one side in annoyance as she crosses her arms. Her glowing amber eyes lock onto yours, and she growls, [amber.speech(What is it this time, bitch?!)]

Despite her angry tone, you know that Amber's been instructed by Zaranix to let you inside. With that in mind, you answer, [pc.speech(I'm here to visit Zaranix again.)]

Amber narrows her piercing, luminescent-amber eyes and glares at you in an intimidating manner as she responds, [amber.speech(You really don't know how lucky you are to be under the protection of Lilaya... As per my master's instructions, I'll let you in, sure. However, if you know what's good for you, then you'll drop to your knees and apologise for wasting my time first.)]

You could refuse Amber's demand and simply push your way past her, but, then again, maybe it would be a good idea to just do as Amber says and apologise...

Amber's threatening manner is too much for you to bear, and, dropping down on your knees in front of her, you deliver your apology, [pc.speech(Sorry, Mistress Amber! I didn't mean to get you angry... Please forgive me!)]

[amber.speech(How pathetic,)] Amber snarls, lifting up her right foot and pushing the heel into your chest. [amber.speech(You're such a little bitch, aren't you?)]

Before you can respond, the fiery-haired maid suddenly pushes her leg forwards, and, unable to keep your balance, you find yourself being kicked backwards down the couple of steps that lead up to the front door. Laughing out loud, Mistress Amber snarls down at you, [amber.speech(Stupid bitch, having your mouth blocked like that. I wanted to get you to lick my shoes in front of everyone here. Oh well. Heel.)]

As the fiery-haired maid snaps her fingers at her side, you move to do as you're told. Looking down at the ground and trying your best to ignore Mistress Amber's piercing gaze, you crawl back up the couple of steps to her side.

Before you can respond, the fiery-haired maid suddenly pushes her leg forwards, and, unable to keep your balance, you find yourself being kicked backwards down the couple of steps that lead up to the front door. Laughing out loud, Mistress Amber snarls down at you, [amber.speech(Stupid bitch. Heel.)]

As the fiery-haired maid snaps her fingers at her side, you move to do as you're told. Looking down at the ground and trying your best to ignore Mistress Amber's piercing gaze, you crawl back up the couple of steps to her side.

Before you can respond, the fiery-haired maid suddenly pushes her leg forwards, and, unable to keep your balance, you find yourself being kicked backwards down the couple of steps that lead up to the front door. Laughing out loud, Mistress Amber steps forwards, reaching down to grab #IF(pc.getHairLength()>6) a fistful of your [pc.hair+], #ELSE the back of your neck, #ENDIF before dragging you out into the street in front of her master's home. Glaring down at you as you shuffle about on your knees, Mistress Amber sneers, [amber.speech(Now, you're going to show everyone here what a useless bitch you are!)]

Letting you go, Mistress Amber moves around in front of you, before raising her foot and pushing her heel into your face. [amber.speech(Lick it, bitch.)]

[pc.speech(I have nothing to apologise for, Amber,)] you state. [pc.speech(So if you'll kindly step aside, I have business with your master.)]

Amber grits her teeth, but, bound by her master's instructions, she steps back and allows you to step inside. With a furious snarl, she slams the door behind you as you enter, and, pushing her way past you, she looks back over her shoulder as she growls, [amber.speech(If you cause any trouble, I will get the Enforcers involved; Lilaya's protection be damned!)] With that, she strides off into the house, leaving you alone in the entrance hall.

Mistress Amber grins evilly down at you as she raises her foot and kicks your [pc.arms] out from under you. [amber.speech(Stupid bitch. Push yourself up and crawl inside like the worthless worm that you are.)]

You let out a sigh, but, not wanting to anger your Mistress, you do as she says, and crawl forwards into the entrance hall. With a derisive laugh, Mistress Amber shuts the door behind you as you make your humiliating entry, and, stepping past you, she turns to look down at you as she growls, [amber.speech(If you cause any trouble, I will get the Enforcers involved; Lilaya's protection be damned! Do you understand, bitch?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber.)] you reply, eager to get this over and done with.

[amber.speech(Good bitch. Now, I'm not going to waste my time escorting you around the house, so you'd better be on your best behaviour in my absence. Let yourself out when you're ready to leave.)] With that, she strides off into the house, leaving you alone in the entrance hall.

[pc.speech(You're being completely unreasonable here, Amber,)] you say, standing up and shaking your head at the fiery-haired maid. [pc.speech(I've already apologised, I'm not going to lick your shoes!)]

[amber.speech(Don't you dare take that tone with me, you worthless bitch!)] Amber spits, her eyes glowing with an intense fury as you disobey her command.

[pc.speech(Just let me inside,)] you sigh, stepping forwards.

Amber snarls, but, bound by her master's orders, she steps back, allowing you to enter Zaranix's home. With a furious snarl, she slams the door behind you as you enter, and, pushing her way past you, she looks back over her shoulder as she growls, [amber.speech(If you cause any trouble, I will get the Enforcers involved; Lilaya's protection be damned!)] With that, she strides off into the house, leaving you alone in the entrance hall.

[pc.speech(Was that to your liking, Mistress Amber?)] you ask, trying to push the thought of what you've just done out of your head as you look up at the fiery-haired maid.

[amber.speech(I suppose.)] Amber grins evilly down at you as she raises her foot one last time and pushes her shoe against your [pc.lips+]. [amber.speech(Good bitch. Now crawl inside like the worthless worm that you are.)]

You let out a sigh, but, not wanting to anger Amber, you do as she says, and crawl forwards into the entrance hall. With a derisive laugh, Amber shuts the door behind you as you make your humiliating entry, and, stepping past you, she turns to look down at you as she growls, [amber.speech(If you cause any trouble, I will get the Enforcers involved; Lilaya's protection be damned! Do you understand, bitch?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber.)] you reply, eager to get this over and done with.

[amber.speech(Good bitch. Now, I'm not going to waste my time escorting you around the house, so you'd better be on your best behaviour in my absence. Let yourself out when you're ready to leave.)] With that, she strides off into the house, leaving you alone in the entrance hall.

[pc.speech(Mistress Amber... Please... I don't want to...)] you meekly whimper, reluctant to lick the filthy soles of Mistress Amber's shoes.

[amber.speech(Bad bitch,)] Mistress Amber spits, glaring evilly down at you as she raises her foot one last time to roughly push her shoe against your [pc.lips+]. [amber.speech(You can kiss it instead.)]

[pc.speech(Thank you, Mistress Amber!)] you cry out, happy that your Mistress isn't going to force you to lick her soles. Obediently doing as you're told, you plant a loving kiss on Mistress Amber's shoe, before leaning back and looking up at her. [pc.speech(May I enter now, Mistress Amber?)]

Having had her fun, Amber snaps her fingers at her side. [amber.speech(Fine. Heel.)]

You do as you're told, looking down at the ground and trying your best to ignore the fading laughter of the succubi as they move off and carry on with their business. Crawling alongside Amber, you're quickly led back up the couple of steps to Zaranix's front door.

[amber.speech(Come on then, bitch. Crawl inside like the worthless worm that you are.)]

You let out a happy little cry, and, rushing to obey Mistress Amber, you do as she says and crawl forwards into the entrance hall. With a derisive laugh, Mistress Amber shuts the door behind you as you make your humiliating entry, and, stepping past you, she turns to look down at you as she growls, [amber.speech(If you cause any trouble, I will get the Enforcers involved; Lilaya's protection be damned! Do you understand, bitch?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber! I'll be good, Mistress Amber!)] you quickly reply, eager to obey.

[amber.speech(Good bitch. Now, I'm not going to waste my time escorting you around the house, so you'd better be on your best behaviour in my absence. Let yourself out when you're ready to leave.)] With that, she strides off into the house, leaving you alone in the entrance hall.

[amber.speech(What a good bitch you are,)] Mistress Amber sneers, glaring evilly down at you as she raises her foot one last time to roughly push the sole of her shoe against your [pc.lips+]. [amber.speech(You're very lucky to be allowed to clean the grim from my shoes, aren't you?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber!)] you cry out, desperately licking the bottom of Mistress Amber's shoe, before she steps back and moves to one side.

[amber.speech(Come on then, bitch. Crawl inside like the worthless worm that you are,)] Mistress Amber commands.

You let out a happy little cry, and, rushing to obey your Mistress, you do as she says and crawl forwards into the entrance hall. With a derisive laugh, Mistress Amber shuts the door behind you as you make your humiliating entry, and, stepping past you, she turns to look down at you as she growls, [amber.speech(If you cause any trouble, I will get the Enforcers involved; Lilaya's protection be damned! Do you understand, bitch?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber! I'll be good, Mistress Amber!)] you quickly reply, eager to obey.

[amber.speech(Good bitch. Now, I'm not going to waste my time escorting you around the house, so you'd better be on your best behaviour in my absence. Let yourself out when you're ready to leave.)] With that, she strides off into the house, leaving you alone in the entrance hall.

Not seeing any alternative, you hesitantly #IF(pc.isTaur()) lie down on your lower [pc.legRace]'s body #ELSE drop down onto all fours #ENDIF as the maid commands. Sensing your reluctance, the succubus growls down to you, [amber.speech(Come on, bitch, I haven't got all day!)]

Still feeling uneasy about what it is you're expected to do, you falter a little as you slowly drop your face down towards her feet.

[amber.speech(What are you doing?!)] the succubus angrily shouts, [amber.speech(You're to answer, 'Yes, Mistress Amber!', and immediately obey my commands! Now let's try it again shall we?! 'Come on, bitch, I haven't got all day!')]

You let out a humiliated whimper as you do as you're told, and answer Amber in the proper manner, [pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber!)]

An evil, mocking laugh drifts down to you, and, still in full sight of the street behind you, you drop your mouth down to Amber's feet. The black high heels that she's wearing are in keeping with the rest of her maid's uniform, with a little lacy white bow adorning each one. Deciding to choose her right foot, you bring your [pc.lips+] down to the black leather, breathing in the faint, warm scent of sweat as your nose draws near to her white cotton stockings.

[amber.speech(Lick it, bitch,)] Amber snarls, eager to see you humiliate yourself. [amber.speech(You wouldn't want to make me angry, now, would you?)]

Deciding that it's best to do this quickly and get it over with, you press your [pc.lips] down against the tip of Amber's shoe, before pushing forwards and dragging your [pc.tongue+] up and over her feminine footwear. The bitter, tangy taste of leather, dirt, and shoe polish overwhelms your taste buds, and you struggle to stop yourself from gagging as you draw back, wiping your tongue on your shoulder as you try to remove the horrible taste from your mouth.

[amber.speech(Hahaha! How pathetic!)] Amber laughs, lifting her foot and using your [pc.arm] to wipe the saliva clean from her shoe, before turning to call out to a group of passing succubi. [amber.speech(Do you girls want to see something fun?)]

The succubi turn towards Amber, and upon seeing your submissive form, they burst out laughing. Amber turns back to you and snarls, [amber.speech(Lick it again, bitch. Slowly, this time.)]

Just wanting to get this experience over with, you do as Amber commands, and, ignoring the giggles and mocking taunts of the group of succubi that quickly surrounds you, you slowly drag your [pc.tongue] once more up the length of Amber's shoe. Once you're done, Amber makes you repeat the motion with her other shoe, laughing along with the group of demons as they cruelly taunt you.

Having had her fun, Amber snaps her fingers at her side. [amber.speech(Heel.)]

You do as you're told, looking down at the ground and trying your best to ignore the fading laughter of the succubi as they move off and carry on with their business. Crawling alongside Amber, you're quickly led back up the couple of steps to Zaranix's front door.

Eager to show your submission to the dominant maid, you immediately move to do as you're commanded. [pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber!)] You happily cry, and, in full sight of the street behind you, you drop your face down towards her feet.

[amber.speech(What an obedient bitch! Come on now, get started! I haven't got all day!)] Mistress Amber laughs, pushing her heel into your face.

As an evil, mocking laugh drifts down from above, you lower your mouth to Amber's feet. The black high heels that she's wearing are in keeping with the rest of her maid's uniform, with a little lacy white bow adorning each one. Deciding to start with her right foot, you bring your [pc.lips+] down to the black leather, letting out a little moan in anticipation as you breathe in the warm, faintly sweaty scent of her white cotton stockings.

[amber.speech(Lick it, bitch.)] Amber snarls, eager to see you humiliate yourself. [amber.speech(You're enjoying this, aren't you, you filthy slut?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber!)] you enthusiastically reply, before pressing your [pc.lips] down against the tip of her shoe. Pushing forwards, you eagerly drag your [pc.tongue+] up and over her feminine footwear, relishing the bitter, tangy taste of leather, dirt, and shoe polish that immediately strikes your taste buds. Pulling back, you start once more from the tip of Mistress Amber's shoe, licking up and down as you seek to clean every [unit.size] of the delicious black leather.

[amber.speech(Hahaha! How pathetic!)] Mistress Amber laughs, lifting her foot and using your [pc.arm] to wipe the saliva clean from her shoe, before turning to call out to a group of passing succubi. [amber.speech(Do you girls want to see something fun?)]

The succubi turn towards Mistress Amber, and upon seeing your submissive form, they burst out laughing. Amber turns back to you and snarls, [amber.speech(Lick it again, bitch. Slowly, this time.)]

You happily do as the fiery maid commands, and, as the crowd of succubi giggle and taunt you, you slowly lick and kiss your Mistress's shoe. The sadistic succubus joins in with the other girls, cruelly mocking you as you lick her shoe to a spotlessly clean finish. Pulling her foot back, she then pushes her left shoe towards your face, and you submissively set about licking that one clean as well.

After a short while, you've polished both of Mistress Amber's heels to a shiny finish, and she lets out a spiteful, derisive laugh, [amber.speech(Hahaha! I can't believe how pathetic you are! I bet you want more, don't you bitch?! What do you say girls, should this slut clean my soles as well?)]

The crowd of succubi laugh and cry out in assent. You look up at Mistress Amber to see a manic smile break out across her face, and she lifts her shoe up to present the grimy sole to your face. [amber.speech(Get to it, bitch!)]

As Mistress Amber pushes the filthy sole of her heel into your face, you obediently dart out your tongue and start eagerly licking and kissing the undersides of the sadistic maid's shoes. The salty, grimy taste of dirt fills your mouth as you submissively clean the soles, moaning in delight as both Mistress Amber and the crow of succubi continue to sneer and call you degrading names.

After you've finished with the first shoe, Mistress Amber quickly switches you to the next. Pushing the dirty underside of her other heel into your face, she snarls, [amber.speech(Pathetic bitch! Come on, you can do better than that!)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Mistress Amber!)] you reply, letting out whimpering little moans as you obediently lick all the dirt from the soles of her shoes.

Once she's satisfied that you've done enough, Mistress Amber lifts her foot a little higher, before forcing the heel into your mouth. After obediently sucking it clean, you lick your lips as Amber pulls back, before forcing you to perform the same treatment on the heel of her other shoe.

Finally, you're done, and as Mistress Amber steps back, you feel thoroughly pleased with your work. Both of her shoes are now spotlessly clean, and, having had her fun, the fiery-haired maid snaps her fingers at her side. [amber.speech(Heel.)]

You do as you're told, looking down at the ground and trying your best to ignore the fading laughter of the succubi as they move off and carry on with their business. Crawling alongside Amber, you're quickly led back up the couple of steps to Zaranix's front door.

The entrance hall to Zaranix's home, while nothing compared to that of Lilaya's, is nonetheless very impressive. A huge crystal chandelier casts its bright, arcane-powered light over the entire area, and fine paintings in golden frames hang on each of the surrounding walls.

The main door to Zaranix's home is made from thick, sturdy oak, and while it would be impossible to break it down, you're already inside, so there's nothing stopping you from simply unlocking it and taking your leave.

Before you, a wide, red-carpeted staircase leads up to the first floor of Zaranix's house. On either side, a corridor leads to other parts of the house, and behind you, the entrance hall offers an opportunity to make your exit.

Much like the rest of the house, the walls surrounding you are home to several fine paintings. Well-crafted cabinets, cushioned chairs, and little wooden tables are strategically dotted about here and there, but not so much so as to make the area seem cluttered.

You could use the stairs here to gain access to the first floor, where both Zaranix and his succubus maid, Kelly, are to be found.

You find yourself comparing the corridors of Zaranix's home to those of Lilaya's. While they're just as well-furnished as those of your aunt's house, being home to numerous fine paintings, cushioned chairs, and well-crafted cabinets, they're not quite as wide nor high. Where once you might have been deeply impressed by the extravagant luxury of this incubus's mansion, you now find yourself thinking that it's not quite as grand as the one you live in.

A gravel path snakes through the entirety of Zaranix's garden, but, finding that the stones crunch loudly underfoot, you opt to walk on the small grass verge instead so as to remain as quiet as possible. To either side of the path, numerous flowerbeds and small glass structures are home to an incredible variety of plant-life, much of which is quite clearly alien to your old world.

Although small enough not to pose a threat, you see several, tentacle-like varieties squirming and twisting about with a mind of their own; the brightly coloured flower in the centre of each one looking unmistakably like a vagina. Inspecting yet more of the flora as you move along, you notice that some of these tentacled plants have penis-like endings, and you spend a moment reflecting on the fact that even the plant-life in this world is sexual in nature. From the variety of herbs, plants, and flowers, and the evidence of careful cultivation techniques, it appears as though this garden is less for show, and more for the practical purpose of gathering arcane ingredients.

The faint shimmer of an arcane barrier can faintly be seen above the garden's fence, resulting in the only means of exit being to travel back through Zaranix's house to the front door.

A gravel path snakes through the entirety of Zaranix's garden, but, finding that the stones crunch loudly underfoot, you opt to walk on the small grass verge instead so as to remain as quiet as possible. To either side of the path, numerous flowerbeds and small glass structures are home to an incredible variety of plant-life, much of which is quite clearly alien to your old world.

Although small enough not to pose a threat, you see several, tentacle-like varieties squirming and twisting about with a mind of their own; the brightly coloured flower in the centre of each one looking unmistakably like a vagina. Inspecting yet more of the flora as you move along, you notice that some of these tentacled plants have penis-like endings, and you spend a moment reflecting on the fact that even the plant-life in this world is sexual in nature. From the variety of herbs, plants, and flowers, and the evidence of careful cultivation techniques, it appears as though this garden is less for show, and more for the practical purpose of gathering arcane ingredients.

Connected to the garden by means of a pair of sliding glass doors, the room you find yourself standing in appears to be some sort of utility room. A row of cupboards and cabinets line one of the walls, while a long counter-top runs the length of the opposite one.

A wooden door, opposite to the glass ones that provide access to the garden, connects this room to the rest of the house, and you wonder if you should proceed into the main building itself, or go back out into the garden.

As you walk down the corridor, an ivory-skinned succubus, wearing a light pink maid's uniform, suddenly stands up from behind a cabinet. She doesn't notice you at first, and continues to swipe her little feather-duster over the top of the wooden furniture, happily humming away as she works.

Before you have a chance to say anything, she looks up and catches sight of you. Letting out a little cry, she curtsies as she greets you, [katherine.speech(Ah! [pc.Miss] [pc.name]! Mistress Amber informed me of your visit. I'm Katherine, at your service!)]

As the maid stands up, you see her lustful gaze roaming up and down your body. Biting her lip, she steps towards you, and with more than a little lust in her voice, she moans, [katherine.speech(If there's anything I can do for you, just let me know. Master Zaranix only has time for Amber these days... N-Not that I'm complaining, but... Well... My sister and I get lonely, you understand...)]

Katherine giggles, and, as she bats her eyelids at you, drops the little feather duster that she's holding. [katherine.speech(Oops!)] she cries, pretending that it was by accident. Bending over right in front of you, she makes a show of flashing her crotchless pink thong in your direction, granting you an unobstructed view of her [katherine.pussy+]. Obviously desperate for you to fuck her, you wonder if you should make a move on this horny maid...

Up ahead, you see the ivory-skinned maid, Katherine, busily dusting one of the corridor's picture frames. As you approach, you see that the maid glances at you out of the corner of her eye. Instead of turning and acknowledging your presence, however, Katherine pretends not to have seen you, and suddenly bends over to dust the skirting board. The horny maid makes a show of flashing her crotchless pink thong in your direction, granting you an unobstructed view of her [katherine.pussy+].

Turning her head to look back at you, Katherine lets out a little cry as she rather-unconvincingly pretends to have only just noticed you. Standing up to face you, she curtsies and bites her lip to suppress a needy moan. [katherine.speech([pc.Miss] [pc.name]! How pleasant to see you again! If there's anything I can help you with, just let me know!)]

Obviously desperate for you to fuck her, you wonder if you should make a move on this horny maid...

Deciding to take up Katherine's transparent offer of sex, you step forwards, grinning as you let your gaze wander up and down over the maid's perfect body. [pc.speech(Well, there is one thing that a horny little succubus like you could do for me.)]

Katherine lets out an excited squeal as she gazes into your eyes, and you see them filled with a desperate, burning lust. Bounding forwards, she suddenly wraps her arms around your back, and with a desperate moan, presses her [katherine.lips+] against yours.
